name: mockazon
author: Lukas Teixeira Doepcke <lteixeir@ucsc.edu>, Evan Metcalf <evmetcal@ucsc.edu>, Eesha Krishnamagaru <elkrishn@ucsc.edu>, Hunter Tratar <htratar@ucsc.edu>, Trevor Ryles <tryles@ucsc.edu>

scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-auth-up && npm run docker-order-up && npm run docker-product-up
scripts.docker-down: npm run docker-auth-down && npm run docker-order-down && npm run docker-product-down
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-admin && npm run install-helloworld && npm run install-shopper && npm run install-vendor-public-api && npm run install-vendor-web-app && npm run install-auth && npm run install-order && npm run install-product
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run admin" "npm run helloworld" "npm run shopper" "npm run vendor" "npm run auth" "npm run order"
scripts.lint-vendor: cd "Vendor/PublicAPI" && npm run lint & cd "Vendor/WebApp" && npm run lint
scripts.lint: npm run lint-admin & npm run lint-auth & npm run lint-order & npm run lint-helloworld & npm run lint-shopper & npm run lint-vendor
scripts.build: npm run build-auth && npm run build-products && npm run build-orders && npm run build-admin && npm run build-vendorapp && npm run build-shopper && npm run build-vendorapi
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-auth && npm run ci-products && npm run ci-orders
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-products" "npm run start-orders"
